AboutPage.Title: About + Resume
AboutPage.Desc: Let's get to know each other
AboutPage.Subtitle: I am Hayssem Elsayed
AboutPage.Description: Project & Product Manager, Product Owner & Scrum Master Certified
AboutPage.Description2: Passionate Product Manager with over six years of hands-on experience leading successful features, products, and digital initiatives by leading projects, sprints, ensuring high-quality delivery, exercising collaborative team and stakeholder management. I strive to always be up to speed on different topics including coding and design to be able to deliver and discuss with all stakeholders.
AboutPage.Description3: I fled from a traditional path and explored my creativity, by trying my hands on various techniques and technologies. Product Management is more than just a profession for me, and I try to dig deep into it. Today, I like to use my skills for critical thinking, empathy, and creativity to create viable and impactful solutions.
